com.percussion.services.assembly
Interface IPSTemplateSlot

All Superinterfaces:
IPSCatalogIdentifier, IPSCatalogItem, Serializable
public interface IPSTemplateSlot
extends IPSCatalogItem

A template may have one or more slots. Each slot is populated in assembly by an object that implements the interface IPSSlotContentFinder.

Author:
dougrand

Nested Class Summary
static class IPSTemplateSlot.SlotType
          Slot type defines the usage of the slot

getRelationshipName

String getRelationshipName()
The relationship name is deprecated in favor of assigning a slot content finder with parameters that include the relationship name.

Returns:
Returns the relationshipName.

setRelationshipName

void setRelationshipName(String relationshipName)
Set a new relationship name

Parameters:
relationshipName - The relationshipName to set, may be null or empty

getFinderName

String getFinderName()
Get the finder that will fill the slot contents for this slot. The actual finder instance will be looked up using the extensions manager. Note that PSO, development or a customer can extend the available finders at any point by registering a new finder that implements IPSSlotContentFinder with the extensions manager. The context should be "global/percussion/slotcontentfinder/".

Returns:
the name of the finder, never null or empty

getFinderArguments

Map<String,String> getFinderArguments()
Get the arguments to pass to the finder instance's find method. The arguments are dependent on the particular finder.

Returns:
the a copy of the finder arguments, may be empty, but never null

addFinderArgument

void addFinderArgument(String name,
                       String value)
Set the given argument to the given value.

Parameters:
name - the name of the argument, never null or empty
value - the value, never null or empty

removeFinderArgument

void removeFinderArgument(String name)
Remove the given argument from the finder arguments

Parameters:
name - the name of the argument, never null or empty

setFinderArguments

void setFinderArguments(Map<String,String> arguments)
Set the new arguments, see getFinderArguments() for the semantic details.

Parameters:
arguments - The new arguments to set, it may be null if wanting to empty the existing arguments.

getSlotAssociations

Collection<PSPair<IPSGuid,IPSGuid>> getSlotAssociations()
Get the collection of content type and templates that this slot is associated with. The returned collection can be modified, but no change to the underlying association will be made until the corresponding set method is called with the new data.

The first element in each pair is the guid to the content type, the second is the template's guid.

Returns:
get the slotAssociations set, never null

setSlotAssociations

void setSlotAssociations(Collection<PSPair<IPSGuid,IPSGuid>> slotAssociations)
Set the new slot associations, see getSlotAssociations() for the semantic details.

Parameters:
slotAssociations - The slotAssociations to set never null.
